DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
Deal 1 Damage for each 10 Magical Rot at the end of your Turn to EVERYONE.
Affects the efficiency of your spellcasting.
Affects the efficiency of your damaging attacks.
Affects the efficiency of your defensive abilities.
Triggered when your highest stat is changed.
Orb: Deal Damage equal to your #yLethality to a random Enemy. #yEvoke automatically at the end of your turn.
